title: Allow exclude filters on Import tag when globbing
body:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46786132/how-to-exclude-projects-from-import-when-using-wildcard-with-msbuild-import

I have a top level msbuildproj ``foo.csproj``. In this project I have the line

    <Import "**\*.props"/>

However this includes the ``bin`` directory which is at the same level as the project file. I have tried


    <Import Project="**\*.props" Exclude="obj;bin" />
    <Import Project="**\*.targets" Exclude="obj;bin" />

Is there a way to solve this



but I get


[![enter image description here][1]][1]


  [1]: https://i.stack.imgur.com/nM57E.png

nodes.body: This is a reasonable idea but it looks like there isn't much demand for it, so I don't think we're going to get to it.
